行きたくないなぁ.meaning: I don't want to go (with feeling)

心をおどらせる.meaning: to make the heart dance (to be excited)

わからなくなってしまった.reading: わからなくなってしまった

途中.meaning: in the middle of / along the way

したくても.meaning: even if I want to do (phone)

ちゃんと学校行こう.reading: ちゃんとがっこういこう

がんばる.meaning: to try hard, to do one's best

って.meaning: sentence-ending particle indicating quotation or explanation

一体.meaning: exactly; what on earth; in the world

ん.meaning: sentence-ending particle expressing emphasis or uncertainty

う.meaning: A phonetic component in various words, often representing a vowel sound.

壁際.meaning: edge of a wall; wall side

張り付い.meaning: stuck to; clinging to (stem of verb)

て.meaning: sentence-ending particle indicating a continuous action or state

い.meaning: A phonetic component, often part of verb conjugation

伝わっ.meaning: to be conveyed; to be transmitted (stem)

そもそも.meaning: in the first place; to begin with

なんて.meaning: such a thing as; what a...

飛び交う.meaning: to fly about; to flit about; to be exchanged rapidly

見える.meaning: to be seen; to appear; to seem

昔.meaning: former times; the past; old days

話す.meaning: to speak; to talk; to tell

こうして.meaning: in this way; like this; thus

切り売り.meaning: selling in small quantities; piecemeal sale

呼ば.meaning: to be called (stem of よばれる)

っけ.meaning: particle indicating a question about something previously mentioned

そんな.meaning: such; that kind of; like that

持っ.meaning: to hold; to have (stem of もつ)

随分.meaning: quite a lot; considerably; quite; very

折れ.meaning: to break; to bend; to fold

舞い込む.meaning: to come flying in; to pour in; to be overwhelmed by

醍醐味.meaning: the best part; the essence; the cream of the crop

充満.meaning: to be filled with; to be full of

しまっ.meaning: put away; closed; finished (past tense, informal)

向こう.meaning: over there; yonder; the other side

より.meaning: than, from, more than, by, since

見つめ.meaning: gaze, stare, to look intently at

聞こえる.meaning: to be heard, to be audible

気.meaning: mind, feeling, spirit, atmosphere, mood, air, gas

せい.meaning: because of, due to, owing to, fault, sake, nature, quality

佇む.meaning: to stand; to wait; to linger

でる.meaning: to go out; to leave; to appear

見えれ.meaning: could see (past tense, less common form)

言っ.meaning: said (past tense, abbreviated form of 言った)

際立た.meaning: to stand out; to be prominent

せる.meaning: to cause (to do); to make (something happen)

演目.meaning: program; performance; item on a program

合う.meaning: to meet; to fit; to suit

ざわつく.meaning: to be restless; to be noisy; to buzz

口元.meaning: mouth; the area around the mouth

当てる.meaning: to hit; to apply; to guess correctly; to shine (light)

得体.meaning: form; shape; nature; appearance (often suggesting something mysterious or unsettling)

知れ.meaning: to be known; to be aware of

広がる.meaning: to spread; to expand; to widen

お.meaning: honorific prefix (used before verbs and nouns)

押し込め.meaning: to suppress; to cram; to confine
